name: helloworld
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.initialize: cd res && npm install && npm run build:dev && cd .. && npm install && cordova prepare
scripts.emulate:browser: cd res && npm run build:dev && cordova run browser
scripts.emulate:android: cd res && npm run build:dev && cordova run android
scripts.emulate:device: cd res && npm run build:dev && cordova run android --device

author: Apache Cordova Team
